summary: Minor recolor to the Silver Sword. Featuring a refined silver color for the blade and a golden shade for the guard / hilt.
descriptionHtml:
The armor featured in the screenshots do not belong to me they are part of http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1982 by eternalsoul2012, if you\'re looking for a smexy recolor of the blades armor get that mod. 

Continuing on, I found that the silver swords looked rather appealing to me aside from the Akaviri katanas and decided to make it more appealing. With this simple recolor/tex I sharpened and made the silver on the blade look a bit more Silvery instead of a dull iron color, the handle and hilt are now a golden color which in my opinion look better then the default ironish color.

Install -

Extract to Skyrim -> Data folder, you may be prompted to merge files click yes if you are. Be advised if you have another mod that alters the texture of the Silver Sword it will be overwritten if you choose to do so. Be sure to back up your files.


~~Update v1_1~~
Updated textures for the silver sword, darker refined gold guard/hilt. Polished silver texture for blade. Some torch lighting instances may make the silver appear to have a slightly green shade, so still working to fix that. But overall I believe it looks better then the previous version.
author: Kitsune32
